name: CARNAGE OFFERING TD
description:
Developed by Futurtech Studio, Carnage Offering TD is a classic tower defense real-time strategy game. Journey to the year 2528, a dystopian world in which Jake, Paul, Roy and Hiro work for the Alliance, a federation fighting the threat of robot replicators that looms over the universe. The machines are increasingly infecting the confederacy's planets with genetically modified monsters. Site Alpha is a strategic base where the Alliance is building protective turrets. Protect humanity from extinction!Build Towers for Protection
From the machine gun turret to the fusion mortar or the Tesla power plant, the towers all have a special feature that will save your ass in difficult situations.

In addition to the large number of turrets you will have the possibility to upgrade them outside of combat to increase their stats such as range, damage, critical hits or hit points. You will even have the possibility to farm thanks to mining which will allow you to build your turrets faster or to boost your towers when the situation requires it.Get to Know the Heroes' Abilities Jake and Paul will have different fighting techniques.



Jake with his rifle will be effective at long range to repel hordes of enemies, he can then change weapons and undergo transplants to increase his abilities.


Paul with his telekinetic sword will be very useful in close combat. He will suffer more damage but his upgradeable armor will protect him from enemy attacks.Improve Heroes and Technologies
Outside of combat, in addition to turret upgrades, you can upgrade your heroes and technologies. Redoing the missions will be useful to get the money that will allow you to make these improvements.

8 Essential Technologies.
You will be able to crash a satellite on a target area, perform mass repairs on your turrets, lay explosive mines, to make appear reinforcement soldiers or launch a nuclear missile. All technologies are upgradeable and will change their visual appearance.Move to Different Corners of the Universe
18 replayable levels with multiple difficulties.
Moving from a medieval city to a zombie-infected town or an underground base full of reapers, our heroes travel to the far reaches of the universe to reach their goal. All levels are completely different and take players on a journey for the better, but also for the worse.

Over 30 different enemies and bosses.
If the environments are very varied, so are the monsters and robots. Each enemy has special abilities such as healing, ranged attack, poisoning, spawn or a protective shield. Knights, witches, zombies, mutant insects, werewolves, soldiers, demons, spaceships and robots are waiting for you...Features
  • 44 varieties of towers spread over 7 classes;
  • Over 200 upgrades;
  • 2 Customizable Heroes;
  • 8 essential technologies;
  • 18 replayable levels with multiple difficulties;
  • Over 30 different enemies and bosses.
Developer's Note I am very happy with your feedback on CARNAGE OFFERING games. Even if we have a primary vision in the development, your opinions are very important for the improvement of our games. The best testers are you.


CARNAGE OFFERING TD will be released in early access to involve players in the development. Everyone will participate through reviews. They will be read and taken into account to improve the game. The constructive messages that will help the development will be treated in priority. If the projects of the CARNAGE OFFERING franchise are sufficiently supported, a sequel will be planned in the coming months with always a better quality of content.
